title: (x) Keep America Beautiful National Programs sans - Whitney {Marc O}

comments.content:
It’s Whitney, from H&FJ.

(BTW, your image is CMYK, which prevents many browsers from displaying it.)
Thank you so much! And I apologize about the color space.
